price: 49. Qaranwal tanim kee baaxol taniimiy mutuccu ittaa kee malayka Yallah kummatta usun kay qibaadal kaxxamariinite kalah.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِۤ يَسۡجُدُۤ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِن دَآبَّةٖ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walillahi yasjudu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi min dābbatin wal-malāikatu wahum lā yastakbirūna
